original_title: Christina Aguilera: Back to Basics and Beyond
overview: Christina Aguilera's Back to Basics and Beyond, released exclusively at Walmart, is a documentary including studio footage, behind-the-scenes of the album photo shoot for Christina's new album Back to Basics, plus music videos and live performances of the smash hits "Ain't No Other Man" and "Hurt."
title: Christina Aguilera: Back to Basics and Beyond
